subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: On a wild day for everyone around him, Tom Pernice Jr. kept it steady and simple Saturday and shot a one-under-par 69 at the AT&T National in Bethesda, Md.
snippet: On a wild day for everyone around him, Tom Pernice Jr. kept it steady and simple Saturday and shot a one-under-par 69 at the AT&T National in Bethesda, Md.
